https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1oNJx88dgEV9olGzK2cPJNiyfxn.jpg Two brothers live alone in a shack in the woods, trying to overcome their abusive past. But when a girl is killed nearby, fearing retribution from the townspeople, they cover up her death, kidnap the only witness and embark on a murderous journey. Bloodshed
